text.title: New Zealand begins process to consider changing national flag design
text.head: New Zealand begins process to consider changing national flag design
Sources

list.item: AAP with Fairfax Media. "New Zealand flag debate begins" — The Sydney Morning Herald , May 5, 2015
. "New Zealanders encouraged to join flag discussions" — The New Zealand Herald , May 5, 2015
Simon Wong. "NZ flag debate set to open to public" — 3 News , May 5, 2015
AAP. "New Zealanders asked to flag ideas for a new design online" — The Guardian , May 4, 2015
